short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate in-browser website code generator. Generate CSS(3), HTML(5), Microdata, JSON-LD, Open Graph, Twitter Cards and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Code Tools is the app that every web developer should use if you're just starting out. Even if you're an expert, you can definitely find some use in it. Generate cross-browser compatible CSS(3) and HTML(5). Also generate Microdata (including Google supported Rich Snippets), and even Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags.

More features coming soon. Stay tuned!

** Latest changes **

- Added JSON-LD Generator

- Brand new design

Version 2.1
- Added Music Album Microdata generator
- Added Music Playlist Microdata generator
